The spark floated before BrightBlade, but fell into her hands. Gangon sent
BrightBlade a message.

"......Hello....." That was it. Most likely it was because his spark was
confused and damaged...
----- Original Message -----
From: "Moon Mist" <shadowwarrior_ax@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, July 16, 2000 8:31 AM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars





* BrightBlade held out her hands in front of her chest as she saw the spark
lower, knowing by the signature that it gave off that it was, indeed,
Gangon. She smiled towards it as she drew her hands together and cupped
them, giving Gangon's spark a well place to rest if he chose to lower
himself to her outstretched hands.
But then a worried expression came to her face, wondering just how his spark
had been separated from his body. *

" I was wondering where you had been. What happened?"

* She knew that sparks could communicate telepathically so she knew that her
question would be answered, thinking or just how interesting a story Gangon
might relate.
But she then heard Prendabot, explaining to her about the terrain around the
Cybertronien Fire, finishing his sentence in her mind of how her action was
suicide.
However, what he didn't know was that she knew all that he said.and had
prepared for it. She had brought stealth devices, small machines that
shielded one's signature and cloaked as well. She knew what she was doing,
having spent years as an assassin for hire.
BrightBlade then wore a serious expression on her face, one that was needed
to get her points across when she had some to make. *

" Suicide? No. Difficult? Yes.  Trained skills, experience, and half a
million shards of energon worth of equipment make this mission nothing more
then child's play."

* She then looked back towards Perndabot to see his reaction, still keeping
her hands cupped before her chest for Gangon's spark. Just catching the
Alliance bot's eyes sliding down her body makes her feel slightly excited
and her serious look turns to that of a smile, her body being worth the
attention of a bot like Perndabot makes her feel slightly special.
Then standing in the way that showed her every curve again she then hears
him ask whom the spark was, the smile still on her face as she looks at
Gangon again. *

" A friend and fellow Predacon."

* It made her feel good to be in the company of the two males, one with a
physical appearance and one without. Gangon with his compliments towards her
and Prendabot with his preying eyes, still wondering if Perndabot was ever
going to compliment her and if Gangon was ever going to show any serious
interest in her. It was strange, Gangon always complimented her but never
made a move, never once pretended to stretch and slip his arms around her.
But yet it seemed like he liked her, REALLY liked her. And Perndabot just
seemed to have an interest in her appearance at the moment, though she
didn't mind his roaming eyes she still wouldn't mind a compliment or two.
BrightBlade sighed deeply, maybe one day. *
